Articles.Content:
Helo guys, i have just spent the last few hours looking through the broken firespitter file, and i managed to get some code that helped me fix the gears for B9! it is shaky, but, your gear should work after it. you can download it HERE: http://www./download/8wyvldacg5wlekn/B9GearFix.cfg

i hope it helps! plese tell me problems with it! goodbye!
